list_sample.title: Variant Image Swatches with Price
list_sample.content: Featuring variant pricing directly with each variant in the eye-catching swatches to facilitate the shopping journey and conserve valuable time for your customers

list_sample.title: Color/ Custom Swatches
list_sample.content: Provide creative flexibility through our color/custom swatches. Choose hex colors or upload images (in bulk) to craft tailored shopping experiences and intricate designs.

list_sample.title: Validate Options with Confirmation
list_sample.content:
Boost order accuracy and prevent sizing errors with our confirm selection feature.`${
}`Validate their choice before adding items to the cart, reducing returns or exchanges.

list_sample.title: Customize Out of Stock Variants
list_sample.content: Control how out of stock variants are displayed in your store. Choose to cross out, grey out or hide unavailable options, providing a clear shopping experience for your customers.

list_sample.title: Show Low Stock Alert
list_sample.content: Create urgency and keep your customers informed with Low Stock Alert.

list_sample.title: Product Groups
list_sample.content: This is the feature that helps you to connect different products and show them under the type of variants. This feature shows in the collection page and product page.

list_sample.title: Product Bundles - Combo products
list_sample.content: Push sales when selling many products simultaneously with the product bundles to get a discount

list_sample.title: Product Bundles - Quantity breaks
list_sample.content: Encourage customer to buy more to save more with quantity breaks
